summary:
"Let's have some fun shall we?"
My version of villain deku! I know its something that everyone  and their mom has done but I...
body:
“Let’s have some fun shall we?”

My version of villain deku! I know its something that everyone and their mom has done but I love the concept okay. In my version he’s kidnapped by the league during the stain arc and gets brainwashed into becoming a villain.

tags: aah this isnt very good is it
summary: Could you do a Todoroki x reader au where the class ends up doing a hide and seek game, and shouto and the reader end up hiding...
question: Could you do a Todoroki x reader au where the class ends up doing a hide and seek game, and shouto and the reader end up hiding together under the car? Thought this would be fluffy
answer:
Thank for requesting and sorry this is a bit late. I was a bit sick today. What better time than this to write fanfiction?

Aaah, I’m not a good fluff writer, so this may not be as good as you wanted it, I’m sorrrryyyyyy :(

*****

‘Okay, Kirishima you count, we hide,’ Mina ordered cheerfully. After a very dull day of just plain classes, the soon- to- be- Heroes were bored out of their minds. Kirishima had suggested they play a game to which Mina readily replied with the game of hide and seek.

‘Why me? Bakugou could do it!’

“No damn way. I’m not playing this shitty game,” Bakugou announced as he got up and went to his dorm.

‘Let’s start then!’

*****

You were not prepared.

At least that’s the excuse you gave yourself when you could not manage to find a hiding spot.

‘…3, 2,1.’

Well, shit. 

Frantically looking around for some sort of cover, you made your way towards the car park and got under one of the cars. This was such a stupid idea. If you were going to be a hero one day, you needed to be smarter than hiding under a car. The best option would be to change places after-

‘(Name)?’

Remarkably, you suppressed the urge to scream and your instincts almost made you activate your quirk. Guess you were a Hero after all. 

‘Todoroki?! What are you doing here?’

‘I was going from the hospital to the dorms. Midoriya just told me about the game.’

That explains his shitty hiding spot.

‘The hospital, huh? Are you sick? You should have told someone, maybe me as well. I could have given you company.”

‘Y- you want to go to the hospital with me?’ He said, the only change in his expression being his slightly widened eyes.

Was the red on your cheeks so apparent? Is that why he stuttered?

‘Of course, going to the doctor alone is so disheartening. I would go there anytime with you… Unless you don’t want me to.’

‘That’s not it,’ for a moment he was hesitant. He was keeping something from you. But he opened his mouth again, and you were attentive as ever. To be able to listen to something the aloof Todoroki considers a secret, why exactly were you getting this special treatment?

‘It’s my mom. I go to the hospital to visit her. And… and you can come… if you want to.’

With the brightest smile you could muster you said, ‘Then the next time you go to see her, take me with you, alright?’ 

Todoroki did not look you in the eyes and merely gave a nod. Was his scar always that big, or are his cheeks red? You could not tell.

You heard foot steps advancing towards you; Kirishima was coming. Funny, moments before you were cursing yourself for hiding here and yet right now you were ecstatic you chose it.

As Kirishima’s steps became louder, a silence fell over the two of you. All you could hear was your heart thumping wildly and his steady breaths.

Even though this was a fairly bad situation to be in - on the cold ground, under a car with some of it poking you - you felt like you could be here forever.

Send in a request pls…!

And please do tell me what you thought about this. This is, strictly speaking, my first attempt at fluff.

summary: Pride and Joy - Chapter 1 - Sloane - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
title: Pride and Joy - Chapter 1 - Sloane - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 2/3
Fandom: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Characters: Todoroki Shouto, Todoroki Enji | Endeavor, Todoroki Fuyumi, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Class 1-A (My Hero Academia), Shuuzenji Chiyo | Recovery Girl, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki
Additional Tags: Age Regression/De-Aging, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Breaking the Cycle of Abuse, Manga Spoilers, Poetic Justice, Bakugou Katsuki Swears A Lot, Todoroki Enji | Endeavor’s Bad Parenting
Summary:

“Why did you call me?”

Fuyumi gave him a long-suffering smile. “He likes you best.”

Shouto was still mulling over the full meaning of that statement when a police officer led them into a private room. Once the door shut, it was just Fuyumi, Shouto, Aizawa, and a very angry, very young looking Todoroki Enji.

aizawa: take your hands out of your pockets

bakugo: fine

aizawa: all of them

bakugo, unzipping a secret compartment in his pants that are filled with millions of tiny plastic hands, letting them spill onto the floor: fine

blog.name: ladhads-layout
blog.title: Ladhads_Layout
blog.description: Hello, my name is Lea (Leah). I am a girl (She/her pronouns) I am Pansexual. This is my art blog. I post on it whenever I can and I might just add my justscrolling account to this one. My icon is drawn by Sei.exe on Instagram. They said the icons are for free use so I am allowed. I also posted some of the other ones on my other account @ladhads-justscrolling.

blog.name: dailygir1z
blog.title: Our love is pure. Our love is beautiful.
blog.description:
A trans lesbian headcanon blog formed in the wake of @daily-girlz hacking so that trans women will forever have a place to safely project and headcanon. Currently penned by Mods Miyu, Arashi, Faye, and Tombo.

Links here!

We do not accept submissions for: Happy Sugar Life, Killing Stalking, Citrus, most 'yandere' characters (make a very good case for yourself and we might accept as we look at these from a case-to-case basis, but don't get your hopes up)

blog.name: bhsdesk
blog.title: The Desk of BHS
blog.description:
Observations, anti-nihilism, and geek obsessions from BHS, author of Tasakeru, Stars Above, Respect, Shattered Skies: The Morning Lights, and other stuff, and host of YouTube's Silent InvenTOYry. Personal account for AskOutcasts.

Expect delays, plus frequent non-sequitur humor, nerdy fanboying, magical girls, gushing over Steven Universe, and llamas.

M | he/him | ace/aro

Become a Patron!
